name: Moltres
flavorText:
Known as the
legendary bird of
fire. Every flap of its wings
creates a dazzling
flash of flames.

previous.name: Zapdos
previous.flavorText:
A legendary bird
POKéMON that is
said to appear from clouds while
dropping enormous
lightning bolts.

next.name: Dratini
next.flavorText:
Long considered a
mythical POKéMON
until recently when a small
colony was found
living underwater.
